snippet: After the child sexual abuse scandal exploded in Europe and beyond, the Vatican defrocked 260 priests in 2011 and 124 more in 2012, according to statistics compiled by The Associated Press.
abstract: Vatican confirms that it defrocked 260 priests for the sexual abuse of children in 2011 and 124 more in 2012 after the scandal exploded in Europe and beyond and bishops forwarded hundreds of cases to the Vatican.
lead_paragraph: After the child sexual abuse scandal exploded in Europe and beyond, the Vatican defrocked 260 priests in 2011 and 124 more in 2012, according to statistics compiled by The Associated Press.

headline.main: 384 Priests Defrocked Over Abuse in 2 Years
headline.print_headline: 384 Priests Defrocked Over Abuse in 2 Years
